abstract: NCAA adopts new anti-discrimination measure, intended to protect athletes and fans attending events, by reworking its process for evaluating bids to host sporting events.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. Board of Governors on Wednesday adopted an anti-discrimination measure that would affect the way the N.C.A.A. evaluates bids to host sporting events.
